DESCRIPTION:
Verify that a courier cannot log in using incorrect password.
Expected result: HTTP 404 response and an error message "Учетная запись не найдена" in response body.
NAME: Should return 404 when password is incorrect

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that creating a courier without a password fails.
Expected result: HTTP 400 response and an error message "Недостаточно данных для создания учетной записи" in response body.
NAME: Should return 400 when creating a courier without password

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that creating a courier with an existing login fails.
Expected result: HTTP 409 response and an error message "Этот логин уже используется. Попробуйте другой." in response body.
NAME: Should return 409 when creating a courier with an already used login

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that a courier cannot log in using incorrect login.
Expected result: HTTP 404 response and an error message "Учетная запись не найдена" in response body.
NAME: Should return 404 when login is incorrect

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that an order can be created with black, grey, both colors, or with no color selected.
Expected result: HTTP 201 response and the order tracking number in the response body.
NAME: Order creation returns 201 Created with various color combinations

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that a courier cannot log in when the login field is missing.
Expected result: HTTP 400 response and an error message "Недостаточно данных для входа" in response body.
NAME: Should return 400 when login field is missing

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that creating a courier twice with the same data fails.
Expected result: HTTP 409 response and an error message "Этот логин уже используется. Попробуйте другой." in response body.
NAME: Should return 409 when trying to create two identical couriers

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that a courier cannot log in using credentials of a non-existent user.
Expected result: HTTP 404 response and an error message "Учетная запись не найдена" in response body.
NAME: Should return 404 when logging in as a non-existent user

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that a courier can log in using valid credentials.
Expected result: HTTP 200 response and the courier ID in the response body.
NAME: Login returns 200 OK with valid login and password

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that a valid request returns a list of orders.
Expected result: HTTP 200 response and a list of orders in the response body.
NAME: Getting list of orders returns 200 and contains a list of orders in response body

DESCRIPTION:
Verify that a courier can be created with valid required fields.
Expected result: HTTP 201 response and "ok: true" in response body.
NAME: Should return 201 when creating a courier with valid required fields
